title: Job Openings at Shulifang Biotechnology
content:
Shulifang Biotechnology is a Chinese company located in the lekki free zone Lagos Nigeria. which produces and manages household daily necessities, such as dishwashing liquid, powder detergent, edible oil, etc

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Sales Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job  Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're seeking a results-driven Sales Officer to join our dynamic team. As a Sales Officer, you'll be responsible for driving sales growth, building customer relationships, and expanding our market presence.


Key Responsibilities


	Sales Growth: Meet and exceed sales targets through effective customer engagement and relationship-building.
	Customer Relationship Management: Develop and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential customers.
	Market Research: Stay up-to-date on market trends, competitor activity, and customer needs.
	Product Knowledge: Develop and maintain in-depth knowledge of our products/services.


Requirements


	Sales experience, preferably in a similar industry.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong negotiation and closing skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


What We Offer


	Salary: N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.
	Competitive salary and commission structure.
	Opportunity to grow with a dynamic company.
	Professional development and training opportunities.


Application Closing Date: 30th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: nigeriaslf.btf@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Product Marketer - Cosmetic Products

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description 


	We're a leading cosmetic company seeking a creative and results-driven Product Marketer to join our team. 
	As a Product Marketer, you'll develop and execute marketing strategies to drive sales and brand awareness for our cosmetic products.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop marketing campaigns to promote cosmetic products.
	Conduct market research to stay updated on trends and consumer behavior.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to launch new products.
	Manage product positioning and messaging.
	Analyze sales data to optimize marketing strategies.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business, or related field.
	2+ years of experience in product marketing, preferably in the cosmetic industry.
	Strong creative and analytical skills.
	Excellent communication and project management skills.


What We Offer


	Salary: N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.
	Competitive salary and benefits.
	Opportunity to work with a leading cosmetic brand.
	Professional growth and development opportunities.
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment.


Application Closing Date: 20th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: nigeriaslf.btf@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: If you're a motivated and creative marketer, Apply!

 

 

3.) Sales Executive (Vegetable Oil / Soybean Oil)

Job Locations: Kaduna, Ore - Ondo, Makurdi - Benue, Uromi - Edo, Lagos and Abeokuta - Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Description 


	We're a leading manufacturer / distributor of high-quality vegetable oils, including soybean oil. We're seeking an experienced Sales Executive to drive sales growth and expand our customer base in the above locations.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve targets.
	Build and maintain relationships with existing and potential customers.
	Identify new business opportunities and expand customer base.
	Conduct market research to stay updated on industry trends.
	Collaborate with internal teams to ensure seamless customer experience.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Business, Marketing, or related field.
	2+ years of experience in sales, preferably in the FMCG/food industry.
	Strong communication and negotiation skills.
	Ability to work independently and meet sales targets.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and commission structure.
	Opportunity to work with a leading brand.
	Professional growth and development opportunities.
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment.


Application Closing Date: 10th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: nigeriaslf.btf@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Content Marketing Manager Job at Innov8 Hub
content:
Innov8 Hub is an Innovation Startup driven organisation with a mandate to groom generations of Innovators, Inventors, and Researchers across the board. Innov8 is a focal point for Innovation Startup Incubation, Technology Transfer, Knowledge and Skill Impartation, Prototype Development, and Fabrication. We strategically aid organizations and individuals seeking to transform their ideas into inventions, inventions into solutions, and solutions into enterprises.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Marketing Manager

Job Location: Abuja
Job Type: Full-time

Job Summary 
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for an experienced content and marketing Manager who will work collaboratively across the business function and with key internal and external stakeholders to develop, oversee and implement content marketing and consumer communications strategies and deliver profile-raising campaigns while leading a marketing team.
	This role will drive awareness, interest, and excitement for our mission, services, projects and products through proactive communications, content and events efforts.


Job Responsibilities


	Content and Communication Strategy: develop the consumer-oriented, lifestyle media and content strategy to deliver omnichannel communications campaigns which address key business, consumer segment and brand needs.
	Content Creation and Deployment: own and lead the deployment of consumer-facing content and communications campaigns to maximize reach and improve ROI.
	Content Calendar: collaborate with the brand team to create a content and communications calendar that is aligned to the annual brand calendar
	Secures Opportunities: Identifies, partners with/curate unique opportunities and events to profile our clients'/partners' products in an experiential way to generate exposure for Innov8.
	Media Engagement: cultivate, oversee and expand relationships with consumer-facing media to achieve brand profiling and desired positioning.
	Media Plan Deployment: prepare media plans and draft stories/narrative/press releases to address communication priorities and achieve desired brand positioning. This includes planning, buying and deployment of media amplification.
	Digital communications: Work and liaise closely with internal teams to ensure correct news and regular content updates.
	Utilize the website as a key communication tool to support content marketing. Utilize SEO, amplification and programmatic, within regulatory parameters, to improve website traffic generation leading to improved awareness and understanding of metrics and website lead generation.
	Reporting: Record and analyze data to track progress against key metrics and prepare relevant reports.
	Budget Management: Manage the content marketing and communications budget to deliver the business KPIs.


Required Qualifications & Skills


	Degree or equivalent in Brand Marketing, Communications or relevant study.
	Experience in Brand / Digital / Content Marketing, Communications / PR, Account management/ Program Management at an agency or in a corporate setting
	In-depth experience in managing brands and executing communications campaigns across different channels.
	Familiar with B2B and B2C marketing.
	Skilled in writing campaign plans for short- and medium-range programs to engage journalists, bloggers and broadcast media in co-creation of stories with solid experience of creative storytelling, developing, pitching and securing stories.
	Familiar with harnessing traditional and social media outlets to promote consumer messages for products and brands.
	Ability to work cross-functionally and with external agencies to build strong working relationships and manage/deliver communications campaigns.
	Proficiency in English with superior written and oral communication skills.
	5 years of experience as a manager in Content Production or Marketing Communications.
	Excellent storytelling and verbal communication skills.
	Knowledge of CRM software and social media monitoring tools.


Application Closing Date
16th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV and Cover Letter to: hr@innov8hub.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Account Officer Job at AllFlavors Supreme Foods
content:
AllFlavors Supreme Foods manufactures premium snacks with high quality ingredients, using top quality machines and advanced techniques to reach and maintain our products' premium quality. We are ISO 9001 and 22000 certified.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer
Job Location: Isolo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: FMCG

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We seek a detail-oriented and reliable Account Officer to support our finance department and ensure efficient financial operations.
	The ideal candidate brings experience in cost accounting, budgeting for production processes, and financial oversight in a manufacturing environment


Key Responsibilities


	Maintain accurate and up-to-date financial records
	Prepare and review financial statements and reports
	Manage accounts payable and receivable
	Ensure compliance with financial regulations and internal controls
	Reconcile bank statements and ledgers
	Assist in budgeting and forecasting activities
	Process invoices, payments, and staff reimbursements
	Liaise with internal departments and external auditors as needed


Education, Qualifications and Experience


	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	Minimum 3 years of experience in accounting roles, preferably in the manufacturing sector.
	Professional qualification will be considered a plus.
	Working knowledge of all statutory legislation and regulations.
	Strong understanding of accounting principles and practices.
	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., SAP, Odoo, QuickBooks) and MS Excel.


Skills and attributes:


	A solid understanding of financial statistics and accounting principles.
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
	High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
	Strong organizational and time-management abilities.
	Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.


What we offer


	Competitive salary and benefits package
	A dynamic and collaborative work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: fin@allflavor.odoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Business Development Manager Job at Pyfinest Resources
content:
Pyfinest Resources - Our client is a leading provider of innovative solar power systems, CCTV, and access control solutions in Nigeria, specializing in sustainable energy and advanced security technologies.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager
Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	As a highly motivated Business Development Manager, you will spearhead client acquisition, revenue growth, and market penetration in the renewable energy and security tech sectors.
	The ideal candidate will combine technical knowledge with proven sales expertise to develop strategic partnerships and exceed targets.


Key Responsibilities
Business Growth & Strategy:


	Identify and pursue new business opportunities in solar energy, CCTV, and access control markets.
	Develop and execute sales strategies to meet quarterly revenue targets.
	Analyze market trends, competitor activity, and customer needs to refine offerings.


Client & Stakeholder Management:


	Build and maintain strong relationships with B2B clients, contractors, and government entities.
	Lead high-value negotiations and close deals with corporate clients and project developers.
	Represent the company at industry events, exhibitions, and networking forums.


Sales Performance & Reporting:


	Manage the full sales cycle from prospecting to contract signing.
	Maintain accurate records in CRM systems and provide weekly sales reports.
	Collaborate with technical teams to design customized solutions for clients.


Market Intelligence:


	Stay updated on Nigerian energy policies, incentives, and compliance standards.
	Leverage knowledge of solar financing models (e.g., PAYG, leasing) to drive sales.


Requirements


	Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Engineering, or related field.
	Experience: Minimum 3+ years in B2B sales/business development, preferably in solar, security tech, or construction.


Skills:


	Exceptional negotiation, communication, and presentation skills.
	Proficiency in CRM software (e.g., Salesforce), Microsoft Office, and data analysis.
	Technical understanding of solar PV systems, CCTV, and access control solutions.
	Attributes: Self-driven, adaptable, and results-oriented with a proven sales track record.


Why Apply?


	Lucrative Earnings: Base salary + commissions (top performers earn significantly above industry standards).
	Career Growth: Opportunity to lead a high-impact team in a rapidly growing sector.
	Impact: Contribute to Nigeria’s sustainable energy and security infrastructure.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a 1-page cover letter (addressing their fit for the role) to: pyfinest.hr@gmail.com using the Job Position and their name as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
